---@class #REPLACE_CLS_NAME#
require "class"
local common = require "common";
local #REPLACE_CLS_NAME# = class("#REPLACE_CLS_NAME#", require "UIPageBase");

{3}

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----- var list ----- 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----- function list ------

-- @OnInit new instance only once
function #REPLACE_CLS_NAME#:_OnInit()
end

-- @OnOpen new instance only once
function #REPLACE_CLS_NAME#:_OnOpen()
end

-- @OnShow
function #REPLACE_CLS_NAME#:_OnShow()
	self:_OnRefresh();
end

-- @OnHide
function #REPLACE_CLS_NAME#:_OnHide()
end

-- @OnClose new instance only once
function #REPLACE_CLS_NAME#:_OnClose()
end

-- @OnRefresh
function #REPLACE_CLS_NAME#:_OnRefresh()
    self:refreshPage();
end

-- @refreshPage
function #REPLACE_CLS_NAME#:refreshPage()
    -- do something --

	local visMap = {{}};
	local txtMap = {{}};
	local imgMap = {{}};

    -- do something --

	common:batchSetVisble(self, visMap);
	common:batchSetText(self, txtMap);
	common:batchSetImage(self, imgMap);

    -- do something --
end

----- clicked function ------
